scripts.migrate:patch: pnpm prisma db execute --file prisma/patch.sql --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate: pnpm prisma migrate reset --skip-generate --skip-seed && pnpm prisma migrate dev && pnpm migrate:patch && pnpm prisma generate --no-engine --schema prisma/log.prisma && pnpm prisma db push --skip-generate --schema prisma/log.prisma && pnpm prisma db seed
scripts.build: pnpm prisma generate --no-engine && pnpm prisma generate --no-engine --schema prisma/log.prisma && tsc && tsup src/index.ts --out-dir build
scripts.start: pnpm prisma migrate deploy && pnpm migrate:patch && pnpm prisma db seed && NODE_ENV=production node build/index.js
scripts.start:debug: pnpm prisma migrate deploy && pnpm migrate:patch && pnpm prisma db push --skip-generate --schema prisma/log.prisma && pnpm prisma db seed && NODE_ENV=debug node build/index.js
scripts.test: pnpm prisma migrate deploy && pnpm migrate:patch && pnpm prisma db push --skip-generate --schema prisma/log.prisma && jest --passWithNoTests
scripts.dev: pnpm migrate && NODE_ENV=development ts-node-dev --respawn --files -r tsconfig-paths/register src/index.ts
